section.section: A person who violates any provision of this subtitle is subject to a civil penalty of not more than $2,500 for a first violation of this subtitle.
A person who violates any provision of this subtitle is subject to a civil penalty of not more than $5,000 for each subsequent violation of this subtitle.
Each day a violation under this subsection occurs is a separate violation.

In addition to the denial, suspension, or revocation of the license, permit or certificate, the Secretary may impose a civil penalty on the holder of a license, permit, or certificate under paragraph (1) or (2) of this subsection for each violation of this subtitle.
The total penalties imposed on a person for violations under this subtitle that result from the same set of facts and circumstances may not exceed $25,000.

text.section: Penalties collected by the Secretary under this section shall be paid into the General Fund of the State.
The Secretary shall establish such rules and regulations as are necessary to carry out the provisions of this section.
